miic.core.miic_utils.load_matlab_file¶

load_matlab_file(filename)[source]¶

Load variables from MatLab file.

Load all variables stored in a MatLab (.mat) file and return them as a dictionary with the keys being the name of the variables. The functionality is based on loadmat and inherits its capabilities and limitations.

Parameters:filename (string) – Name of the file to be loaded.
Return type:dictionary
Returns:mat_vars: dictionary holding the variables found in the file. The key is the name of the variable.
